welcome.title: Welcome to Alias
welcome.subtitle: A word-guessing game perfect for gatherings with friends and family.

rules.title: Game Rules
items: Each round, one player explains words to teammates
Teams gain points for correctly guessed words
Teams lose points for skipped words (optional setting)
The game continues until a team reaches the score limit
When a team reaches the score limit, all teams finish the current round
The team with the highest score at the end of that round wins
